sn55.9:1.1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn55.9:2.1: “Asoko, ānanda, bhikkhu kālaṅkato āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi …pe…
sn55.9:3.1: Ayaṁ kho so, ānanda, dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo;
sn55.9:3.2: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṁ byākareyya:
sn55.9:3.3: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’”ti.
